title: Unstoppable
description: Original Justice Alex, Draegyn, Cameron, Roman, Rafael & DomineauThey were all older now, and a lot of turbulent water had rushed and swirled beneath all of their bridges in the years since the war.In the Arizona desert near a tiny town called Bendover, Alex assembled a crew of miscreants, castaways, and loners - all drawn to a speck on the map in the middle of nowhere where Family Justice was born.Now, things have settled into a groove in Bendover while the baby explosion continues!But not everyone is living a happily ever afterNot yet anywayCome along to Bendover in this latest installment of the Family Justice Saga.Find out what happens when a past horror demands closure, a new love blossoms, and two Justice warriors face the biggest challenge of their livesIn Unstoppable, the spotlight shines onRemington and FinnJace and Sophiaand Rafael and DomineauConfronting the past isnâ€™t always easy. UnstoppableCount the blessings
author: Suzanne Halliday
